titleStmt.title: Thomas H. Hardin et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG2221

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
Harrodsburg Ky Oct 11th 1865
Gov Thos. E. Bramlette

We the undersigned would respectfully petition your honor to appoint M C. T. Walker Notary Public for Mercer County in the place of Mr. W. R Thornton who has removed from this place Mr Thornton was clerk in the branch of the Commercial Bank at Harrdosburg, he has resigned that position and Mr. Walker has been elected to fill it. We know Mr. Walker and we say that he is a gentleman in every sense of the word

Thos H. Hardin
James D Hardin
John C. Kyle
E. J. Polk
Nat Gaither
D. W. Thompson
C. S. Abell
J. W. Cardwell --

Notary Public
Mercer Co
M. C. T. Walker
apptd
13 Oct/65
